mapping_objects.comments:
Falcon Insight AMS uses Intel® TDT to enhance Fileless Attack Detection of advanced persistent threats (APTs), ransomware, and dual-use tools during
the earliest steps of the kill chain. CrowdStrike and Intel co-engineered a new, advanced memory scanning (AMS) capability based on Intel TDT. This hardware-accelerated solution brings an important additional layer of defense against IOA. With AMS, the Falcon sensor offloads the performance-intensive memory scans from the CPU to the Intel® Integrated GPU on Intel® Core™ processors.

Integrated with OS: Falcon's Advanced Memory Scanning (AMS) requires Windows 10 or newer. Notable MITRE ATT&CK Tactics and Techniques are located in the accompanying file MITRE_MDR_Round2_Notable_Tatics-Techniques.xlsx

the earliest steps of the kill chain. CrowdStrike and Intel co-engineered a new, advanced memory scanning (AMS) capability based on Intel TDT. This hardware-accelerated solution brings an important additional layer of defense against IOA. With AMS, the Falcon sensor offloads the performance-intensive memory scans from the CPU to the Intel® Integrated GPU on Intel® Core™ processors.

Integrated with OS: Falcon's Advanced Memory Scanning (AMS) requires Windows 10 or newer.
